name: Custom Fee Manager for WooCommerce
author: Bogdan Anton

sections.description:
The Custom Fee Manager for WooCommerce plugin allows you to easily add and manage custom fees at the WooCommerce checkout. This enables store owners to implement additional charges tailored to their business needs.

It is a useful functionality for WooCommerce stores that want to add special charges (e.g., packaging fees, special delivery, etc.) without affecting the basic WooCommerce settings.

Features include:
– Enable or disable custom fees with a simple toggle.
– Add multiple custom fees with customizable names and prices.
– User-friendly settings page integrated into the WooCommerce menu.
– Option to remove fees by simply clearing the fields and saving settings.
– Includes a donation link to support future development.

This plugin is ideal for WooCommerce store owners looking to enhance their checkout process with additional charges.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to the ‘Custom Fee Manager’ settings under the WooCommerce menu and configure the fees as needed.
sections.faq:
What is the purpose of this plugin?

This plugin allows WooCommerce store owners to add custom fees to the checkout process, providing greater flexibility in managing costs.

Can I disable custom fees if needed?

Yes, you can easily enable or disable the custom fee feature through the settings page.

How can I add custom fees?

You can add custom fees by entering a name and price in the settings page, and they will automatically be applied at checkout.

short_description: Manage custom fees during the WooCommerce checkout process based on your settings.
